```{r}
square <- function(x, args = c(1, 2, 1)){
  args[1]*x^2 + args[2]*x + args[3]
}
arg = c(1, 4, 9)
square(5, arg)
square(-1)
square(3, c(5, -20, 15))
square(6, c(5, -20, 15))
for (i in -10:10){
  if (square(i, c(1, 4, -21)) == 0){
    print(c(i, "is the root of the equation "))
  }
}
  
```
